article.title: Rockwell Collins to Provide KC-10 Communications and Navigation Systems
article.text: Rockwell Collins Inc. Cedar Rapids, Iowa, has been awarded a $35,364,765 modification (P00027) to a firm-fixed-price contract (FA8106-11-C-0006) for KC-10 Communication Navigation Surveillance/Air Traffic Management (CNS/ATM) kits and installs. The total cumulative face value of the contract is $114,485,428. This modification provides for the exercise of an option for Group A and B kits and installation for 27 KC-10 aircraft. Air Force Life Cycle Management Center, Tinker Air Force Base, Oklahoma, is the contracting activity.
